policies.description: Ensures all financial transaction records adhere to regulatory retention periods, leveraging cost-optimized cold and archive storage tiers.

rules.description: Automatically migrates financial records to cold storage if not accessed for 90 days, optimizing immediate costs while maintaining accessibility.
Archives financial records to deep, long-term storage after 7 years (2555 days) from creation, meeting extended regulatory retention requirements at minimal cost.
Initiates permanent deletion of financial records 10 years after creation, ensuring data minimisation post-legal retention periods.

policies.description: Manages the lifecycle of marketing campaign and analytics data, balancing performance for recent data with cost-efficiency for historical records.

rules.description: Moves marketing analytics raw data to cold storage after 180 days of no access, optimizing storage costs for less frequently accessed historical data.
Deletes marketing analytics data permanently after 2 years, as its predictive value diminishes and to comply with data minimisation principles.

policies.policy_name: Customer PII Data Privacy & Retention Policy
policies.description: Enforces stringent protection and retention policies for Personally Identifiable Information (PII) to comply with global privacy regulations.

rules.description: Mandates AES-256 encryption at rest for all PII data upon ingestion, ensuring foundational data security.
Transitions PII data to cold storage after 1 year of inactivity, maintaining compliance and cost-efficiency.
Pseudonymizes PII data for customer accounts inactive for 2 years, significantly reducing privacy risk while retaining analytical utility.

policies.description: Guarantees the immediate, immutable archival of all system audit logs for critical security, forensic, and regulatory compliance requirements.

rules.description: Moves audit logs directly to an immutable archive upon creation, ensuring their integrity and preventing modification.

condition.description: Establishes a strict 10-year retention period for all immutable audit logs, fulfilling long-term regulatory and security mandates.
